shortdesc.ph: Sets the parameters for preset voice beautifier effects.
Sets parameters for preset voice beautifier effects.
Sets the parameters for the preset voice beautifier effect.
Sets the parameters for preset voice beautifier effects.

p.codeblock: abstract setVoiceBeautifierParameters(preset: VoiceBeautifierPreset, param1: number, param2: number): number;
Future<void> setVoiceBeautifierParameters( {required VoiceBeautifierPreset preset, required int param1, required int param2});
public abstract int SetVoiceBeautifierParameters(VOICE_BEAUTIFIER_PRESET preset, int param1, int param2);

section.p:
Call this method to set the gender characteristics and reverb effect of the singing beautifier. This method applies to the local user who is sending the stream. Once set, all users in the channel can hear the effect. To achieve better voice effects, it is recommended to perform the following before calling this method:
Call to set the audio scenario to high quality, i.e., AudioScenarioGameStreaming(3).
Call to set profile to AudioProfileMusicHighQuality(4) or AudioProfileMusicHighQualityStereo(5).

Call this method to set the gender characteristics and reverb effects of the singing beautifier. This method applies to the local user who is sending the stream. After setting, all users in the channel can hear the effect. To achieve better voice effects, it is recommended to perform the following operations before calling this method:
Call to set the audio scenario to high-quality mode, i.e., AudioScenarioGameStreaming(3).
Call to set the profile to AudioProfileMusicHighQuality(4) or AudioProfileMusicHighQualityStereo(5).

Call this method to set the gender characteristics and reverb effect for the singing beautifier. This method applies to the local user who is sending the stream. After setting, all users in the channel can hear the effect. To achieve better vocal quality, it is recommended to do the following before calling this method:
Call to set the audio scenario to high-quality, i.e., audioScenarioGameStreaming(3).
Call to set the profile to audioProfileMusicHighQuality(4) or audioProfileMusicHighQualityStereo(5).

Call this method to set the gender characteristics and reverb effect for the singing beautifier. This method applies to the local publishing user. After setting, all users in the channel can hear the effect. To achieve better vocal effects, it is recommended to perform the following before calling this method:
Call to set the audio scenario to high-quality, i.e., AUDIO_SCENARIO_GAME_STREAMING(3).
Call to set profile to AUDIO_PROFILE_MUSIC_HIGH_QUALITY(4) or AUDIO_PROFILE_MUSIC_HIGH_QUALITY_STEREO(5).

ul.li: This method can be called before or after joining a channel.
Do not set the profile parameter in to AudioProfileSpeechStandard(1) or AudioProfileIot(6), otherwise this method will not take effect.
This method is best suited for voice processing and is not recommended for audio that contains music.
After calling , it is not recommended to call the following methods, or the effect set by will be overridden:
This method depends on the voice beautifier dynamic library libagora_audio_beauty_extension.dll. If this library is deleted, the feature cannot be enabled properly.
This method can be called before or after joining a channel.
Do not set the profile parameter of to AudioProfileSpeechStandard(1) or AudioProfileIot(6), otherwise this method will not take effect.
This method is optimized for voice and is not recommended for audio data containing music.
After calling , it is not recommended to call the following methods, or the effect set by will be overridden:
This method depends on the beautifier dynamic library libagora_audio_beauty_extension.dll. Deleting this library will cause the feature to fail to start properly.
This method can be called before or after joining a channel.
Do not set the profile parameter of to audioProfileSpeechStandard(1) or audioProfileIot(6), otherwise this method will not take effect.
This method provides optimal processing for vocals and is not recommended for audio data containing music.
After calling , do not call the following methods, or the effect set by will be overridden:
This method depends on the voice beautifier dynamic library libagora_audio_beauty_extension.dll. If this library is deleted, the feature will not work properly.
This method can be called before and after joining a channel.
Do not set the profile parameter of to AUDIO_PROFILE_SPEECH_STANDARD(1) or AUDIO_PROFILE_IOT(6), otherwise this method will not take effect.
This method is optimized for vocal processing and is not recommended for audio data containing music.
After calling , do not call the following methods, otherwise the effect set by will be overridden:
This method depends on the voice beautifier dynamic library libagora_audio_beauty_extension.dll. Deleting this library will cause the feature to fail.

plentry.pd:
Gender characteristic of the singing voice:
1: Male.
2: Female.

Reverb effect of the singing voice:
1: Small room reverb.
2: Large room reverb.
3: Hall reverb.

Gender characteristics of the singing voice:
1: Male voice.
2: Female voice.

Reverb effect of the singing voice:
1: Small room reverb.
2: Large room reverb.
3: Hall reverb.

The preset audio effect:
SINGING_BEAUTIFIER: Singing beautifier.

Gender characteristics of the singing voice:
1: Male voice.
2: Female voice.

Reverb effect of the singing voice:
1: Reverb effect in a small room.
2: Reverb effect in a large room.
3: Reverb effect in a hall.

Gender characteristic of the singing voice:
1: Male voice.
2: Female voice.

Reverb effect of the singing voice:
1: Small room reverb.
2: Large room reverb.
3: Hall reverb.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: 0: Success.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
0: Success.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: 0: Success.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
